name: bitbucket-code-review-assistant
description: AI-powered Bitbucket code review assistant using N8N workflow automation

scripts.validate: echo "Validating workflow JSON..." && node -e "console.log('Workflow is valid JSON'); JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('./bitbucket-code-review-assistant.json', 'utf8'))"
scripts.setup-env: echo "Please configure your N8N environment variables and credentials as described in README.md"

author: Development Team

features.ai_summary: Automatic code review summaries for small PRs (<200 LoC)
features.size_warnings: Alerts for large PRs with recommendations to split
features.professional_comments: Well-formatted comments with Vietnamese language support

requirements.bitbucket: App Password with Repository Read/Write permissions
requirements.n8n: Self-hosted or cloud instance with webhook support
